label: associatedDocumentLineDocument
comment: A document line associated with this line trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A collection of data for a line on a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
